name: Beenvasion
description:
A short bullet-hell shoot-em-up game made for the Bullet Hell Jam!

For once, enjoy a shoot-em-up that does not take place in outer space. Instead, fight your way through an invasion of insects as a bee!

Fly with WASD, shoot with SPACE.

You are shooting from your pollen supply. It lasts for 10 seconds only before you have to land on a nice flower to refill your pollen supply.

Enjoy!
